description: The Rebel Force is a growing organization dedicated to defending humanity against the Subterraneans.
The Rebels have advanced technological capabilities, including advanced weaponry, defense systems, and communication systems.
The Subterraneans are a group of monstrous, human-like creatures that dwelled deep underground prior to The First Incursion.
The Subterraneans carry a deep-seated hatred for humanity, seeking to reclaim their homeland, Earth, and destroy the Rebel Force.
The Subterraneans have an advantage over the Rebels due to their unique technology, utilizing geothermal energy to power their weaponry and defense systems.
